title: I do not know the email to my account, and cannot update any of my information.
body:
Hi,

So not sure what to do. I haven't played in over a year or longer maybe since I think last time was season 4? Anyways, I want to change my password and update my email and password to match my current stuff that I use since that was a long time ago.

I know past password changes I have made, I know I have spent well over $1000 on this game because I was OBSESSED with skins and collected them. Obviously I know my current account information or I wouldn't be able to log in.

replies.body:
We should be able to help out with that!  But first, you will need to [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so we can work with you one-on-one (we don't want you sharing private information to everyone here on Boards).

We'll get this updated for ya!
